Bug_report.Title: Widget doesn’t have white dash line on display
Bug_report.Environment: Xiaomi Mi 11 Lite Android 11 RKQ1.200826.002, MIUI Global 12.0.8 Stable
Bug_report.STR: 1) Open application 2) Click the add widget button 3) Pay attention to the icons on the main screen
Bug_report.AR: Widget doesn’t have white dash line on display
Bug_report.ER: Widget has white dash line on display
